item.description:
This event was very successful last year so we'll do it again!

For newbies...facial for $20 and a 15 min massage for $15.

For repeaters...facial for $25 and a 15 min massage for $20.

Normally a $140 package.

Where: Alluring Beauty Spa in Manchester

I-384 E to exit 5 (Bolton); take left at end of exit; at lite take left; at the second lite you will see the Senior Center on your right (just after Vernon St); turn right into this road; spa is on second floor of brick bldg on your right. Park on side of road or behind the bldg.

Time: arrive after 5 pm. First come, first served.

Champagne and snacks will be provided.

RSVP soon. Limit 7 people. If we reach the limit and more are interested, I'll schedule another night too!

Linda Karen 860-508-7737

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: Facial and a Massage
